data.message: Still don't know how to get little faces that move! They are my favorites! Where do I find them?

replies.message: Hey Barbara. To use Reactions, hold down the Like button on mobile or hover over the Like button on desktop. You'll see the Reaction image option to select Like, Love, Haha, Wow, Sad or Angry. :) -Jessica
Facebook Sorry, that does not happen on my PC, I only get : "Like this comment" :-(
Facebook Can you help me with my issue too?
Facebook Barbara said the ones that move.

Facebook Facebook Page Appeal: 133972736614875. I've read through the policies and also my previous posts and still do not know which posts violates unauthorized commercial communications or spams. If you will, can you point out which posts are violated and if there's any chance of recovering my Page. It's been 48 months since it's unpublished, would be really appreciated if my Page can be restored again, thank you!!
At the end of where you type in your comment is a happy face. When you hover over it, it says stickers. Click to see lots of moving stickers.
